key.name: langitude
key.description: Langitude of the last place viewed

key.name: longitude
key.description: Longitude of the last place viewed

key.name: zoom-level
key.description: Zoom level of the map last used

key.name: window-width
key.description: Width of the window last closed

key.name: window-height
key.description: Height of the window last closed

key.name: maximized
key.description: Whether the window last closed was maximized or not

key.name: is-prefer-dark
key.description: Whether to show the window in a dark style or not
